nodes.text: Two gamblers won free meals off of patrons, including construction worker Ganzer, of a diner by rolling chance cubes sometime before the rise of the Galactic Empire. After losing to them several times, Ganzer suspected they were cheating. A Jedi Knight offered to play the gamblers, and one fled while the other played him and lost.
The gamblers were mentioned in John Jackson Miller's 2017 short story "The Ride" in the novella collection Canto Bight, released as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi multimedia project.
